key_points.text:
JPMorgan Forecast
Positive Sentiment:
Evercore ISI boosted its target price on Amphenol from $105 to $110 and maintained an “outperform” rating, pointing to additional upside potential.

Positive Sentiment:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. raised its price target on APH from $91 to $120 and reiterated an “overweight” rating, indicating strong confidence in the company’s growth trajectory.

Zacks Buy Recommendation
Positive Sentiment:
Zacks reports that APH is trading near its 52-week high, driven by end-market expansion and targeted acquisitions, and asks whether investors should still buy on strength.
A Zacks analyst preview highlighted strong AI-related demand, defense end-market gains, and the full-quarter impact of recent acquisitions as reasons to “buy” APH ahead of Q2 earnings.

Amphenol Corporation (NYSE:APH) shares are trading higher following a string of bullish analyst reports and optimistic previews ahead of second-quarter results, though some investors remain cautious about current valuation levels.
